title: 'Gentle
body: effective''5.0 out of 5 stars''Not sure about what actually goes into making the product but there are no added perfumes or harsh chemicals. I had post pregnancy stitches which always hurt after periods due to rashes with sanitary pads. After switching to Nua that has gone away permanently! Not rashes even after longer use. Pads are big enough so no leakage too.'

title: 'My go to thing'
body: This product is always in my cart & I keep on buying it every 2-3 months. It should be in everyone's purse who uses a pad during menstruation.

title: 'Quality'
body: I've tried numerous brands over the years, but Nua pads stand out as a clear winner. From the moment I started using them, I noticed a significant difference in comfort and reliability. The design ensures a snug fit, minimizing any chances of leaks, and the material feels soft against the skin, making it comfortable for all-day wear. I truly appreciate the thought and care that went into making this product. It's evident that Nua prioritizes the well-being of its users. I wholeheartedly recommend Nua pads to anyone in search of a superior feminine care product. Five stars for sure!

title: 'The quality is not much better'

title: 'Cotton pads are best.'
body: I am using this for a year now. I had skin issues with whisper and other pads. But once i switched to nua that one thing was sorted out. It's good to use. But I feel the dampness now and then. Cos of which i would give 4 star.
